meanings.definition: A form of incentive offered by retailers where a percentage of the purchase price is returned to the buyer in the form of cash.
meanings.sent1: After buying the new phone, I received cashbacks which made the deal even better.
meanings.sent2: I love shopping at stores that offer cashbacks because I get money back after my purchase.
meanings.sent3: Getting cashbacks feels like a little reward for being a smart shopper.
meanings.sent4: Receiving cashbacks is like finding a hidden treasure in your wallet.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cashbacks is like getting a high-five from the store for shopping there.

meanings.definition: The act of receiving money back from a purchase as a form of rebate or refund.
meanings.sent1: She was thrilled when she received unexpected cashbacks after buying the laptop.
meanings.sent2: Cashbacks are a great way to save money on purchases you were already planning to make.
meanings.sent3: Getting cashbacks is like a little bonus surprise after you've made a purchase.
meanings.sent4: Receiving cashbacks is like getting a small gift from the store as a thank you.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of getting cashbacks is as satisfying as finding money in your pocket you forgot about.
